metadata.title: CVE-2022-0586 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Infinite loop in RTMPT protocol dissector in Wireshark 3.6.0 to 3.6.1 and3.4.0 to 3.4.11 allows denial of service via packet injection or craftedcapture file

criterions.comment: wireshark: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
